below-zero.$description: Stack an element behind elements that do not have a stacking order applied.

zero.$description: Stack an element on the default layer.

above-zero.$description: Stack an element above elements that do not have a stacking order applied, but below elements with other z-indexes applied.

fixed.$description: Use for fixed, sticky, and fullscreen elements.

modal.$description: Use for modals. Modals should be the topmost elements.

ultimate.$description: Use for notifications and tooltips that are triggered from within layers that are normally stacked above tooltips.
